allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
# Create minimal valid ICO file \(16x16, 32-bit\)
$width = 16
$height = 16

# ICO header: reserved\(2\) + type\(2\) + count\(2\) = 6 bytes
$icoHeader = [byte[]]@\(0,0, 1,0, 1,0\)

# Directory entry: w\(1\) + h\(1\) + colors\(1\) + reserved\(1\) + planes\(2\) + bpp\(2\) + size\(4\) + offset\(4\) = 16 bytes
$bmpDataSize = 40 + \($width * $height * 4\) + \(\($width * $height\) / 8\)
$dirEntry = [byte[]]@\(
    $width, $height, 0, 0,  # width, height, colors, reserved
    1, 0,                     # planes \(little-endian\)
    32, 0,                    # bpp \(little-endian\)
    \($bmpDataSize -band 0xFF\), \(\($bmpDataSize -shr 8\) -band 0xFF\), \(\($bmpDataSize -shr 16\) -band 0xFF\), \(\($bmpDataSize -shr 24\) -band 0xFF\),  # size
    22, 0, 0, 0               # offset \(6 + 16 = 22\)
\)

# BITMAPINFOHEADER: 40 bytes
$bmpHeader = [byte[]]@\(
    40, 0, 0, 0,              # header size
    $width, 0, 0, 0,         # width
    \($height * 2\), 0, 0, 0,  # height \(doubled for ICO\)
    1, 0,                     # planes
    32, 0,                    # bpp
    0, 0, 0, 0,               # compression
    0, 0, 0, 0,               # image size
    0, 0, 0, 0,               # x ppm
    0, 0, 0, 0,               # y ppm
    0, 0, 0, 0,               # colors used
    0, 0, 0, 0                # important colors
\)

# Pixel data \(BGRA, blue color\)
$pixels = @\(\)
for \($i = 0; $i -lt \($width * $height\); $i++\) {
    $pixels += @\(255, 128, 0, 255\)  # BGRA
}

# AND mask \(transparent\)
$andMask = @\(\)
for \($i = 0; $i -lt \($width * $height / 8\); $i++\) {
    $andMask += 0
}

$allBytes = $icoHeader + $dirEntry + $bmpHeader + $pixels + $andMask
[System.IO.File]::WriteAllBytes\(''icon.ico'', [byte[]]$allBytes\)
Write-Host ''Created icon.ico''
Get-Item icon.ico
")
